page.title: 03BRIDGE OF WEIR - FAMILY LIFE
page.content: My name is{Suzanne}.I am 11 years old and there are 5 people in my family. This is a typical Saturday for us. My{dad}is a farmer.He does different jobs on a Saturday depending on the weather.At the moment he is cutting and lifting silage for the cows' winter feed.My{mum}usually shops in the morning and bakes in the afternoon.My eldest brother{William who works on the farm attends Oakridge Agricultural College near Edinburgh on a Saturday.{Hugh}who is still at school helps my dad in the morning and supports his football team in the afternoon.I help tidy up the milking parlour after milking is over. Best of all I like to feed the calves and help mum bake. In the evening we all go to check on dad's cows on other land close by at Howwood,Inchinnan and Bishopton.
